forum.content:
電影 Divergent 分歧者 異類覺醒.插曲

I'm thinking it over
我反覆的想
The way you make me feel all sexy,
你給我感覺你愛的是情慾
but it's causing me shame
可這讓我感到羞愧
I wanna lean on your shoulder
我只是希望有你的肩膀能依靠
I wish I was in love,
多冀望可以這麼愛上你
but I don't wanna cause any pain
但害怕受傷的心卻令我膽怯
And if I'm feeling like I'm evil,
如果我一直這樣感到罪惡
We've got nothing to gain.
我們的感情將無疾而終
What if I never even see you cuz
為何我都感覺不到你，
we're both on stage
即使我們就在一起
Don't tell me listen to your song
別告訴我試著聆聽你勾勒的夢幻樂曲
because it isn't the same
因為根本不是如此
I don't wanna say your love is a waiting game
我不得不承認你的愛，就是無止盡的等候

Baby ,I'm thinking it over
親愛的，我想了再想
What if the way we stated made it
something cursed from the start
我們的戀情一開始像被下了詛咒
What if it only gets colder如果天氣變冷了
Would you still wrap me up and tell me
你是否依舊會抱緊我
that you think this was smart
告訴我你的選擇是對的
Cuz lately I've been scared of even thinking 'bout where we are
因為最近想起關係我們，感到如此害怕
What if I never even see you cuz we're both on a stage
為何我都感覺不到你，即使我們就在一起
Don't tell me listen to your song because it isn't the same
別告訴我試著聆聽你勾勒的虛幻樂曲
因為那根本不是如此
I don't wanna say your love is a waiting game
我不得不承認你的愛，是無止盡的等候
What if I never even see you cuz we're both on a stage
為何我都感覺不到你，即使我們就在一起
Don't tell me listen to your song
because it isn't the same
別告訴我試著聆聽你勾勒的虛幻樂曲
因為根本不是如此
I don't wanna say your love is a waiting game
我不得不承認你的愛，是無止盡的等候

urls.title: BANKS - Waiting Game
